Job Description About the roleThe Internet of Things is driving the requirement for a disruptive change in the way connected devices and services are created and deployed. The Arm Mbed IoT Device Platform makes this possible by providing the operating system, cloud services, tools and developer ecosystem to make the creation and deployment of commercial, standards-based IoT solutions possible at scale.Are you passionate about enabling developers and organizations to bring ground breaking innovations into the world of IoT?You will have the opportunity to be part of a global multi-disciplinary team that plays a key role in ensuring the success of the Mbed developer community and customers. You will join a team of engineers focused on understanding the needs of professional developers and working in conjunction with our product teams to deliver market ready solutions while fostering an awesome developer experience.What will I be accountable for?You will be responsible for all developer ecosystem programs and related process development and operationsYou have a strategic understanding of relevant ISG developer audiences, including cloud developers and device developersEnsures effective communication with developer audiences, both outbound as well as inbound feedback on the community as well as productsLeadership of developer ecosystem events and other activitiesManage and coordinate the overall product offering towards developersBudget management for the group Job Requirements What skills, experience, and qualifications do I need?5-10 years of industry experience shipping products, preferably in the IoT space.Bachelor’s Degree in technical area (or equivalent work experience).Experience building end-to-end IoT systems, from embedded software to the cloud. Essential skills & experienceInventive and out-of-box thinker, strong inter-personal skills.Self-starter, and can work effectively in a global, distributed team.Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and either Korean or Japanese language.Willingness to travel 25-50%, both domestically and internationally. Desirable skills & experienceFamiliarity with Mbed.Embedded and cloud development capabilities.Application development experience in at least one higher level language.Familiarity with IoT protocols such as CoAP or MQTT.Experience with wireless technologies such as BLE, LoRa, 6LoWPAN, Thread or WiFi.Experience developing and debugging connected applications utilizing Real-Time Operating Systems (RTOS) on Cortex-M micro controllers. Embedded Linux is a plus.At Arm, we are proud to have core beliefs that reflect our open culture and guide our decisions. Our beliefs define how we work together, and how we evaluate you.HERE IS A PREVIEW: - We, Not I: Take daily responsibility to make the Global Arm community thrive. The essence of progress is that it can’t stop; grow with it and lead your own progress.- Be Your Brilliant Self: Be quirky not egocentric.
